definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: At present, China's commercial banks is also difficult to accurately estimate the expected loss of non-lending.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我國商業銀行還難以準確估算貸款非預期損失。

sentences.english: Beijing also announced the removal of constraints on lending by state-owned commercial bank.
sentences.chinese: 北京還宣佈，取消國有商業銀行的貸款限制。

sentences.english: This is interest rate risk, which had become the main risk of Occident commercial bank.
sentences.chinese: 利率風險已逐步成爲西方商業銀行最主要的風險。

sentences.english: Value of total assets, the CDB is China's fifth largest commercial bank.
sentences.chinese: 以總資產值計算，國開行是內地第五大商業銀行。

sentences.english: The right and liabilities of the taken-over bank will not change because of the take-over.
sentences.chinese: 被接管的商業銀行的債權債務關係不因接管而變化。

sentences.english: Commercial banks may not establish any account books in addition to statutory account books.
sentences.chinese: 商業銀行不得在法定的會計賬冊外另立會計賬冊。

sentences.english: The third part is financial supervision mechanism of national commercial bank.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分國家商業銀行財務監督機制。

sentences.english: Through last winter, China’s central bank repeatedly raised the amount of capital it required Chinese commercial banks to deposit with it.
sentences.chinese: 去年整個冬天，中國央行不斷向商業銀行縮緊銀根。

sentences.english: And propose necessary measure needed by the state-owned commercial bank organizational structure reform.
sentences.chinese: 並提出完善國有商業銀行組織結構改革的配套措施。

sentences.english: He worked for CIBC World Markets.
sentences.chinese: 他爲加拿大帝國商業銀行全球市場部工作過。

sentences.english: Svenska Handelsbanken Capital Markets cut its profitability target for the world’s biggest maker of mobile networks.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典商業銀行資本市場下調了愛立信的利潤預期。

sentences.english: Commercial banks must not set up other accounting books other than that set up according to law.
sentences.chinese: 商業銀行不得在法定的會計帳冊外另立會計帳冊。

sentences.english: State-owned commercial banks improve customer loyalty become an urgency matter.
sentences.chinese: 提高國有商業銀行的客戶忠誠度成爲當務之急。

sentences.english: First, we will firmly press ahead with the shareholding reform of state-owned commercial banks.
sentences.chinese: 一是堅定不移地推進國有商業銀行股份制改革。

sentences.english: The headquarters also ordered commercial banks to upgrade their counterfeit detection system.
sentences.chinese: 上海總部還指示商業銀行升級驗鈔系統。

sentences.english: Finance sustainable development has become the research hot-topic within commercial bank field.
sentences.chinese: 金融可持續發展是國內外商業銀行業研究的熱點問題。

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
